description.zh: 把字串 `text` 中的 `from` 字符串替换成 `to`
description.en: Replace the `from` string in the string `text` with `to`

description.zh: 查找 `text` 中的单词（单词以“空格”、“Tab”或“回车”“换行”分隔）是否符合模式 `pattern` ,如果匹配的话，则以 `replacement` 替换
description.en: Find whether the words in `text` (words separated by "space", "tab" or "carriage return" "line feed ") match the pattern `pattern`, and if it matches, replace it with `replacement`
